title: Coming Up!
author: verias
text:
So, with the Halloween holiday right around the corner, and life throwing tons of uppercuts, we're going to have a small window before this next story starts.

However, it is going to be starring, as you might have guessed, everyone's favorite cyberpunk fairy, Mandrake!

Stay tuned!

Keith W.

replies.author: Aleena*Guest*
replies.text:
Grayscale halloween reminds me of The Skeleton Dance. Last edited by Guest
Edited 1 time(s).

replies.author: JD*Guest*
replies.text: How is Mr. J. and his lovely Mrs?  Have not heard for awhile.

replies.author: Graham*Guest*
replies.text: Was this made by a guest? It doesn't look like your art style.

replies.author: adamas*Guest*
replies.text: Hope things are settling down for you guys. As for this pic of Mandrake...*SQUEE!!!!*
